meanings.definition: A strip of hair left to grow above the upper lip.
meanings.sent1: His mustache was thick and black.
meanings.sent3: The mustache on the cat costume made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: His mustache was like a fuzzy caterpillar on his face.
meanings.sent5: The cowboy's mustache was so long it reached his chin.

meanings.definition: To grow facial hair above the upper lip.
meanings.sent1: He decided to mustache for the first time.
meanings.sent2: She mustaches every November for charity.
meanings.sent3: The wizard mustaches a magical mustache to cast spells.
meanings.sent4: His determination to win made him mustache fiercely.
meanings.sent5: They say he can mustache faster than anyone in town.
